md.function module¶

class md.function.Function(name, in_class=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

A function.

Parameters:
  • name (string) – Name of the function.
  • in_class (instance of type.ResolvableType, optional) – Class of which the function is part.
static find_most_specific(signatures)[source]¶

Find the most specific signatures in a list of signatures.

Parameters:signatures (instances of function.Signature) – List of signatures.
register(signature, f)[source]¶

Register a method.

Parameters:
  • signature (instance of function.Signature) – Signature of the method.
  • f (function) – Function that implements the method.
resolve(signature)[source]¶

Resolve a signature.

Parameters:signature (instance of function.Signature) – Signature to resolve.
Returns:The most-specific signature among the signatures of all applicable methods.
exception md.function.AmbiguousLookupError[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.LookupError

A signature cannot be resolved due to ambiguity.

exception md.function.NotFoundLookupError[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.LookupError

A signature cannot be resolved because no applicable method can be found.
